fish_grilled_salmon.name: Grilled Salmon
fish_grilled_salmon.short: Juicy salmon fillet with lemon butter.
fish_grilled_salmon.description: A tender grilled salmon fillet finished with aromatic lemon butter and seasonal vegetables. Light, fresh and full of flavor.

fish_cod_steak.name: Cod Steak
fish_cod_steak.short: Tender cod fillet in herb sauce.
fish_cod_steak.description: Delicate cod fillet gently cooked and served with a mild herb cream sauce. Perfect for lovers of light fish dishes.

fish_fried_shrimps.name: Fried Shrimps
fish_fried_shrimps.short: Garlic shrimps sautéed in olive oil.
fish_fried_shrimps.description: Aromatic shrimps sautéed in olive oil with garlic and herbs. Intensely flavorful with a tender bite.

fish_tuna_steak.name: Tuna Steak
fish_tuna_steak.description: High-quality tuna steak, seared on the outside and tender pink inside. Refined with sesame and a touch of Asian influence.

fish_calamari.name: Calamari
fish_calamari.description: Golden fried calamari — crispy on the outside, tender inside. Served with creamy aioli.

fish_dorado.name: Grilled Dorado
fish_dorado.description: Whole dorado freshly grilled and seasoned with Mediterranean herbs. Aromatic, healthy and full of natural flavor.
